Individuals with DOLK-CDG typically do not survive into adulthood, often because of complications related to dilated cardiomyopathy, and some do not survive past infancy.",GHR,DOLK-congenital disorder of glycosylation
How many people are affected by DOLK-congenital disorder of glycosylation ?,DOLK-CDG is likely a rare condition; at least 18 cases have been reported in the scientific literature.,GHR,DOLK-congenital
